hero.title: Premium Indian Agricultural Exports
hero.subtitle: Rooted in Quality. Growing Trust Worldwide.
hero.description: Supplying world-class spices, basmati rice, pulses, cashew nuts, cocopeat, and agro commodities to global markets with complete export documentation.

about.title: Your Trusted Export Partner
about.description: GreenNova Exports, based in Bengaluru, specializes in exporting premium Indian agricultural products to international markets. We ensure quality, compliance, and timely delivery.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Us
whyChoose.subtitle: Your reliable partner for quality, compliance, and seamless international trade
whyChoose.qualityDesc: Every product meets international quality standards with ISO & FSSAI certifications and complete documentation.

productsPage.organicRiceDesc: Certified organic Basmati varieties - Chemical-free, natural
productsPage.steamedRiceDesc: 1121 steamed Basmati rice - Retains nutrients, long shelf life
productsPage.moongDalDesc: Green gram beans - Whole and split, superior grade
productsPage.chanaDalDesc: Split chickpeas - Premium consistency for international markets

productsPage.cocoBlocksDesc: 5kg compressed cocopeat blocks - Growing medium, water retention
productsPage.growBagsDesc: Cocopeat grow bags - Ready-to-use for commercial farming

productsPage.w320Desc: Whole white kernels - Most premium export quality

productsPage.w450Desc: White whole cashew nuts - Excellent for snacking and cooking
productsPage.piecesDesc: Cashew pieces and splits - For culinary and bakery applications
productsPage.sugarDesc: Refined white sugar - ICUMSA 45 quality, export-ready
productsPage.coffeeDesc: Arabica and Robusta coffee - From India's hill plantations
productsPage.teaDesc: Black and green tea - Premium Darjeeling, Assam, Nilgiri grades
productsPage.jaggeryDesc: Organic jaggery - Unrefined cane sugar, mineral-rich

aboutPage.title: About GreenNova Exports
aboutPage.subtitle: Your Trusted Partner for Premium Indian Agricultural Exports
aboutPage.whoWeAreDesc: GreenNova Exports is a leading exporter based in Bengaluru, India, specializing in premium agricultural products. We connect Indian farmers to global buyers with a commitment to quality, compliance, and timely delivery.
aboutPage.missionDesc: To deliver the highest quality Indian agricultural products to international markets with complete documentation, transparent processes, and exceptional customer satisfaction.
aboutPage.visionDesc: To become the most trusted export partner for Indian agricultural products worldwide, recognized for quality excellence and business integrity.
aboutPage.qualityDesc: Rigorous quality checks and laboratory testing
aboutPage.step1Desc: Contact us via WhatsApp or email with your requirements
aboutPage.step2Desc: We provide samples and competitive pricing
aboutPage.step3Desc: Order confirmation with secure payment terms
aboutPage.strength1Desc: Sourcing directly from farmers for best quality
aboutPage.commitmentDesc: We are committed to delivering the highest quality products with complete documentation, competitive pricing, and exceptional customer service. Your success is our success.
aboutPage.getStartedDesc: Contact us today for your agricultural product export needs
